subject: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA  
Plot 33, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Way
Central Business District, Cadastral Zone, Abuja,
Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria.
Attention:Beneficiary ,
Hello: - Sir/Madam
The  New President   Bola Tinubu alarmed so much by the rest of the world in the meeting with UN, IMF, Holland security, regarding the inability of beneficiary not meeting up on the international clearance and rule of laws,
Note: The President has stopped all officials from participating in payment of foreigners, therefore, be careful and Mr. President also assure you that he will not let you down as he is prepared to pay your funds immediately.
Kindly contact Mr. President immediately with your Banking information on his email;(
fromofficeofthepresidency@gmail.com
 ) and explain for help to wire transfer your fund to you or else your fund will be confiscated / declined
Don't keep us waiting for your own good.
Thanks.
YOURS SINCERELY,
 DR. OLAYEMI MICHAEL CARDOSO
THE NEW EXECUTIVE GOVERNOR, 
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA (CBN).

subject: Re:   CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate you sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details about the clearance and rule of laws that Mr. President Bola Tinubu is concerned about? I would like to understand the situation better before taking any further action.

Additionally, could you clarify how exactly Mr. President can help with wiring funds? What are the necessary steps and requirements for this process? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of the procedure involved.

Thank you once again for your message, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Merlyn
